special_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. It gains abilities when it’s at certain defense or below.)[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, if sources you control have dealt 7 or more damage this turn, Into the Rogah Throughway deals 4 damage to itself.
[b]Defeated[/b] Stage 2
Whenever Into the Rogah Throughway is defeated, if it was dealt damage this turn, exile it and the top ten cards of your library. You may cast any number of cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.
 Level 3
​
